summary: "Hairspray" is a 2007 musical comedy film set in 1962 Baltimore. It follows Tracy Turnblad, a plus-size teen who loves to dance and wants to be on TV. She also fights against racial segregation. The film is based on the Broadway musical and the 1988 movie by John Waters. It stars John Travolta, Michelle Pfeiffer, and many others. The film was a big hit, making lots of money and getting great reviews. It's now considered one of the best musical films of all time.
title: Hairspray (2007 film)
